summary: The curved claw blades from the chronicles of riddick games
descriptionHtml:
Due to an abundance of constructive criticism v1.1 contains the following changes: 
The blades are renamed Ulaks ingame and their position in the hand is reversed so the blade is pointing down in accordance with the way riddick used them in the athena game. This however causes it to look awkward when sheathed. Images have been updated. The curved part of the blade was chamfered so there are less blocky angles in the curve.
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

This here is a set of dagger like curved claw blades from the vin diesel series chronicles of riddick. They are craftable under daedric category and are upgradeable/enchantable. 
I will improve the sharpness of the edge on the curved part and the blade itself later.
author: siberok92
